title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message:
I have a board that originally had no power. Replace two of the USB-C controller chips which resolves the issue. New issue that i'm having is it's saying the serial number is unavailable. In MEDUSA, the serial number comes up on the EFI file. 

Can anyone assist with a bios file for this board (820-00923). Thanks

title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message:
Medusa shows correct serial, same as the back cover?
Try to fix Fsys checksum with Medusa...

title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message: Yes the serial numbers matches. And i did try Fix Fsys checksum with the same result.

title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message:
Medusa said "ready", no error message?
Upload your BIOS somewhere...

title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message:
Yes it said ready with no error. Heres the bios. 

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1NEiD-osvxUXmthY0qyXOkj6SLnzMtStg[/url]

I did get another board and copied over the bios. Issue resolved. Believe the original file was in fact corrupted.

title: 820-00923: Serial Number Unavailable
message: Once you've got a good BIOS file, clean ME with Medusa and save it for future purpose.
